heading: Our Mission
description: To help you save on transfer fees and exchange rates and get more to family!

heading: Our Vision
description: To develop money transfer solutions that will enable people in the emerging markets to choose different remittance options and the lowest cost option is using our currency

heading: Our Goal
description: To provide fast, low fee and easy online money transfer that is community centric, allowing our customers to send more and pay less. ZipRemit will connect dots and zip each village, town, city and country changing ordinary lives in Africa and beyond
